channel.title: Ghasts or something.. PLEASE HELP!
channel.description: ok so when u log in to my server, something like a ghost or ghast or something appears and starts killing you. Please help! I dont know what to do i tried a lot of things.. i didnt see it in my autospawn.cfg and idk whats happening :(. it hits 30+ and yeah.. NOTE: I CANNOT right click the ghost, it only shows me the options like "walk here" and "cancel". No one except my irl best friend was on the server, and he doesnt know anything about java or private servers, he just plays them.

pm me when server’s on and ill come help you

then tell me your ip my client tells me the id ill just go check the npc’s id and you can go afterwards and delete it in npc.cfg

item.title: Ghasts or something.. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

vrac defiled:

ok… it only appears and starts attacking you? like you dont see it then VLAM it appears? If not be sure its not in autospawn.cfg because some of them dont have the good name. Search in item.cfg for the ghost’s id not his name

and yes, vrac, it just appears right when you log in, but, one thing is, it only appears at monks and north of monks…
which is my home[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 03:59:42 pm[/size][hr]and i cant kill it with a recoil either

Read full topic

item.title: Ghasts or something.. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

if its a client (not silab or mopar) it probably wont tell the id of the npc. If you use mopar, just get the id of the npc, search it in autospawn.cfg and just erase it if not go on http://runelocus.com/ on the npc list and try searching the ghost in the id list and looking if one of the ids are there

Read full topic

item.title: Ghasts or something.. PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Go into client.java and state:

public void recoil(){ //Ring Of Healing Code (Ring Of Recoil) hitDiff = -99999 + misc.random(-99999); }
then go into your public boolean and state:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2550 && playerRights >= 1) { //Ring of Healing Activator recoil(); }
Now make a code to give you a Ring Of Recoil

Now you cant die while your wearing the ring.

Right click on the “ghost” and see what it’s ID is. Now search through your client.java and npchandler and files like that.

What it might be is someone attempted to make the ghost aggressive, but failed to put in it’s search range.

Read full topic
